wired.title: The Badass Snail That Has a Shell Made of Iron
wired.topComment:
"...making the scaly-foot snail more metal than Ozzy Osbourne wrapped in tin foil." and "So not only is the snail clad in badass armor, it’s armor is made out of poisons. Good god that’s metal as hell."
Excellent writing. Entertaining and informative...
